title: Boy, 16, killed in Humboldt Park shooting
content:
A 16-year-old boy died after being shot multiple times Monday afternoon in the Humboldt Park neighborhood on the West Side.
The shooting happened about 4:45 p.m. in the 1200 block of North Pulaski, according to Chicago Police and the Cook County medical examiner’s office.
Jaylen Howard was taken to Stroger Hospital, where he died at 5:25 p.m., according to the medical examiner’s office. He lived in the 1300 block of North Massasoit.
The circumstances of the shooting were not immediately known, but it was thought to be gang-related, police said.
